name: ⚡️ Auto Layout Flexible Inputs – Kit
description:
Flexible auto layout inputs kit!

Use this kit to get started with auto layout inputs for your design system. See the tricks used to make them the most flexible components possible.

  • Over 48 components already made
  • 2 styles, condensed and spaced
  • Text, Textarea, and Dropdown included
  • Material icons included and local styles attached
  • Easily add search, date pickers, or any other input type!


Get other auto layout components here!
